page.title: 18Other Childrens Activities.
page.content: Many of these take place out of the village but not all. Brownies meet on Thursdays in Merebrow School. There are Youth Clubs at the Institute and Holmes Chapel. Swimming clubs at Tarleton Baths. Scouts, Guides and Cubs at either Rufford or Tarleton. Cubs are a group of boys between 8 and 11yrs. They were started by Baden Powell in 1907. Rufford cubs are held on Thursdays from 6.30pm-8pm. We usually have a game then do badge work and play another game before we go home. At Scouts we meet at 7.30 for flag break, 7.35 canoeing on the canal.8.30 badge work, 8.50 football 9.25 flag down, 9.30 home. Guides meet on Wednesdays at 7.30pm. We have blue uniforms with a red neckerchief. Every month we go on Church Parade and camp in the Summer.
